sentences.english: Everything you have ever known Kratos, will now suffer because of your sacrilege .
sentences.chinese: 你要知道你现在所遭受的一切是来自于你的亵渎。

sentences.english: And they preferred hunger and famine to the desecration of the ancestral grave…
sentences.chinese: 他们宁可自己忍饥挨饿也不愿亵渎祖先们的坟茔。

sentences.english: Jewish holy sites were not maintained, and their cemeteries had been desecrated .
sentences.chinese: 因此犹太人的圣地不再得到维护，墓园被亵渎。

sentences.english: I disrespected the most holy laws .
sentences.chinese: 我亵渎了最神圣的法律。

sentences.english: For the Pharisees would have been inviolable.
sentences.chinese: 因为法利赛人本来是不可亵渎的。

sentences.english: He would, in his own idea, desecrate the word by doing so.
sentences.chinese: 他将在他自己的想法，亵渎这样的词。

sentences.english: You desecrate your real father's memory.
sentences.chinese: 你亵渎了你父亲的名声。

sentences.english: The enemy desecrate the church by using it as a stable.
sentences.chinese: 敌人亵渎这所教堂，把它当做马厩。

sentences.english: It is sacrilegious to wear shoes inside a mosque.
sentences.chinese: 在回教教堂内穿鞋子是亵渎神圣的。

sentences.english: For my own sake, for my own sake, I do this. How can I let myself be defamed ?
sentences.chinese: 我为自己的缘故必行这事，我焉能使我的名被亵渎？

sentences.english: They thought it was sacrilegious to hold it on Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为在圣诞节举行佳卡努，无疑是亵渎神灵。

sentences.english: The king's defilers are feared and powerful wizards traditionally in the service of the sorcerermonarchs.
sentences.chinese: 王室亵渎者是世袭侍奉巫王的恐怖而强大的法师。

sentences.english: To admit defeat is to blaspheme against the kaname madoka.
sentences.chinese: 承认失败就是亵渎小圆。

sentences.english: The barbarians defiled the church by using it as a stable .
sentences.chinese: 这些野蛮人亵渎神灵，把教堂当马房。

sentences.english: 29But whoever blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven; he is guilty of an eternal sin.
sentences.chinese: 凡亵渎圣灵的，却永不得赦免，乃要担当永远的罪。

sentences.english: We must be careful to prevent any behaviors of blaspheming His Holy Name.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须小心防范任何亵渎他圣名的行为。

pinyin: shen2 sheng4 bu4 ke3 qin1 fan4

definition: variant of 污衊|污蔑[wu1 mie4]
